network_overview: The trace shows two independent, successful IMS-registration / call-setup SIP transactions over SCTP between UE-facing P-CSCFs (10.235.68.68 & .65) and an IMS-core element (10.235.69.1) in a VoLTE/VoNR environment. No error responses, retransmissions, or user-plane (RTP/GTP) traffic appear, indicating a healthy control-plane snapshot.

observations.finding: Two short-lived SIP flows (0.12-0.13 s, 15-34 pkt/s) with no retransmissions or 3xx-6xx responses.
SIP rides SCTP/IP directly; absence of GTP-U and Diameter confirms bearer is already established and only IMS signaling is captured.
4.8 kB total in 0.24 s is minimal; no risk of link saturation.

recommendations.action: Enable periodic SIP OPTIONS ping between P-CSCF and S-CSCF to detect silent path failures early.
recommendations.rationale: Proactive keep-alive reduces call-setup delay if SCTP association freezes.

recommendations.action: Capture a longer window that includes RTP/RTCP and Diameter (Cx/Sh) to validate end-to-end QoS and charging correlation.
recommendations.rationale: Current snapshot is control-plane-only; user-plane verification is needed for complete VoLTE health checks.

recommendations.action: Confirm SCTP heartbeat parameters (HB-INT, PATH-MAX-RETRANS) on P-CSCF align with MNO policy (<30 s recommended).
recommendations.rationale: Tuning prevents unnecessary UE re-registrations during brief transport glitches.

session_analysis.signaling_health: All SIP transactions completed with 100 Trying and 200 OK; no 4xx/5xx responses or retransmissions observed.
session_analysis.user_plane_health: No GTP-U or RTP flows present in capture—bearer established before trace window or on different interface.
session_analysis.cross_plane_correlation: Without GTP-C/Create-Bearer or RTP packets, cannot correlate QoS, jitter, or packet-loss to this signaling; recommend correlating with S1-U or N3 trace.

sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    participant UE as 10.235.69.1:6611
    participant PCSCF1 as 10.235.68.68:5060
    participant PCSCF2 as 10.235.68.65:6408

    UE->>PCSCF1: REGISTER (Call-ID:asbc47zRmWaCXwykhNhFzykadYy4)
    PCSCF1->>UE: 100 Trying
    PCSCF1->>UE: 200 OK
    Note over UE,PCSCF2: Flow 2 – Invite
    PCSCF2->>UE: INVITE (Call-ID:asbcqzdo4HG9RSkfPCNfIvTgvw9H)

    Note over UE,PCSCF2: No failures observed
